text:
Hi Everyone!  :wave: - I’m swiching custom modules from an old instance to a new instance.

The `module_id` is different form old to new but the `module_block module`  is still the same and because of that, the module cannot render.

Do you have any idea on how to retrieve the name of that `module_block module`  in a new instance ?

Thanks everyone!

Hi, can someone help me with this issue. I have HS tracking code installed on an external page, and we collect non-HubSpot form submissions. However, we also get incomplete submissions (if someone clicks the button but has missing info, wrong email format, etc.). I can’t switch off the non-HubSpot forms because we are using this on another site also.
Can I change something in the tracking code to collect the non-HubSpot submissions only when successfully submitted on the site?
Support seems unable to help
our entire account is impossible to access
we have SSO via Okta that worked perfectly until 9:30 am today BST (give or take)
our Okta admin is on holiday through the 22nd
so naturally, now it is completely broken and we can't log in

```Your identity provider is configured with an incorrect "Audience URI"
As a result, we couldn't log you in. Your administrator needs to address this. Please send them these details.

We expected to be sent the value:
<https://api-eu1.HubSpot.com/login-api/v1/saml/login?portalId=26892217>

but your identity provider sent us the value:
<https://api.HubSpot.com/login-api/v1/saml/login?portalId=26892217>```
error code
nothing has changed on our end
<@U01DSSS4Z6D> <@U04M8KXHTNG> do either of you know who might be responsible for this space? Support said that the "product team" would need to look into it
looks like someone might have requested a change in data center location
that's a good idea - nobody on our end would have done that
the "eu1" gives that away
I'd imagine we would have already been on eu1 though
as we're centered in london
nope that is not happening automatically you need to  request a change. Have you checked with your colleagues handling GPDR stuff that none of them has requested this?
nobody else should even have permissions allowing them to do this
it can be done via  Email to your CAM
well that's bullshit
I can't even get in to check the audit log
if its even tracked
I don't understand the logic behind having permission sets and allowing anyone to request changes as they want
i mean, that change would have been performed outside of the HS app as its a datacenter change from the US to Frankfurt (Germany) i believe
apart from that, i cant help you unfortunately, good luck resolving this!!
sure, but the logic still escapes me - for example if I have a CS agent with an account should they be able to email in because they want a change? lol
thanks mate
always appreciate your help

you´re welcome!
"should they be able to email in because they want a change? lol" - no certainly not and this could potentially called a flaw in the system, but on the other hand, if i think about data center changes, i would not have come to the conclusions that something like this would happen. Now its kind of obvious that it needs improvement, but i would have probably overlooked this consequence as well.
I'm not sure <@U04T2CUCP8T>. do you have a support ticket # I could follow up on?
I didn't get one
I was talking in live chat
This is currently blocking all activity across our entire account

Hey team, I'm trying to track HubSpot form submissions within GA4 on a Wordpress site (HubSpot forms embedded). Do you have any documentation? I tried following this article, but events still aren't flowing thru, and Support sent me here. Thank you!!  <https://www.knslta.com/articles/track-HubSpot-form-submissions-in-ga4>

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report.a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.
I would recommend opening another support ticket and asking for more specific information (or follow back up on the original)
if the person mentioned the product team they may have meant that they were going to escalate the issue
but hard to say, either way they are the best route to troubleshoot
<@U01DSSS4Z6D> 12534486 this is the ticket number they've given, but they gave wrong information back then haven't responded
I asked them to follow up and it has now been escalated. hope that helps expedite a resolution

Was referred to this Slack after talking with HubSpot support.  I'm trying to integrate <http://Apollo.io|Apollo.io> to HubSpot and have full app marketplace access but it keeps giving me the same error code even after I integrated OutplayHQ

Any help would be greatly appreciated :rocket:
are you a super admin?
`<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/faq/installing-an-app>`
Yes, I was able to integrate OutplayHQ after encounter this issue.  Why I'm so confused about <http://Apollo.io|Apollo.io> lol
<@U01DSSS4Z6D> thank you - do you have any direct contact information for me to reach out to? This costs us over £100,000 per day of inactivity
very strange
I agree lol
know of any tips?
Honestly I might just try upgrading your user to super admin and then running it
That's really the only thing I've seen help
I'll try it - thanks!
You also might use the little chat widget on the apollo site (it's a HubSpot widget, haha)
although I highly doubt the person on the other end would have any idea what to do (but might be able to file a ticket)
Can anyone help me out to integrate Voip, any tutorial, suggestions, codebase would be great help. Thank you
